Bar visibility on scroll
Support v
App Bar has the option to enable itself to hide and show
depending on the scroll direction.
X Checkout (©) P 9
Downwards scrolling will hide the App Bar, while upwards
scrolling (reverse) will return the App Bar into view.
Title truncation
Long page title truncate with ellipses"...
& Microwave ovens & micro... Save
Use left position for navigation only
The icons on the left side of the App Bar are reserved for actions that dismiss or
navigate away from a page like a back or close button.

The App Bar is typically present on all pages unless replaced with a custom page
